name: Lucid Lands
description: Lucid Lands is the first decentralized NFT play-to-earn game on BSC network that integrates both 3D-animated gaming NFT and 2D unique computer-generated collective NFT marketplace. Each unique NFT Heroes will hold its intrinsic value complimenting the rarity, which can be traded in the marketplace. Furthermore, these Collectibles are utilized in the game which will aggregate the floor price according to its attributes and activity.
